reviewText: I feel I was trapped into buying this along with "Religulous" from following your recommendation. I believed it would add something to my viewing "Religulous" (which was less costly), but it really added nothing of interest and most of the Rose interview was about an unrelated topic (apparently some issues in directing "What just Happened").
There are not words good enough to describe this item!  Charlie is the best...Will share w/friends who feel like I do.  Bill Maher is also a favorite.  Look forward to "Religulous."
